page.title: 09School Life Now and Then.
page.content: School life has changed in many ways. We decided to write a report on school life. We entitled it "School Life Past and Presant". We interviewed an adult and a child who had attended our school. We found out that both adult and child enjoyed attending this school.We discovered that the main cause for the child today enjoying school is maths but the adult enjoyed the aesthetics subjects like art,sewing etc. During the adult's childhood they did not use computers at school but today we do.We asked two children if they enjoyed working on the computer both answered" yes" so perhaps that is one of the many reasons children enjoy school today.
